nodes.text: Kevin Kiner (born September 3, 1958) is the music composer of Star Wars: The Clone Wars, Star Wars Rebels and Star Wars: The Bad Batch. His previous work in film includes composing the music for the first Leprechaun film (with Warwick Davis) and the Wing Commander film (with Freddie Prinze Jr.), among others. For television, Kiner has scored episodes of Stargate SG-1, Walker, Texas Ranger, and Star Trek: Enterprise. Along with Michael Giacchino, he is one of two composers to have written music for both Star Wars and Star Trek.
